name: MonkData
description: High-level data operations mirroring src/lib/database.ts methods. Provides semantic wrappers around common CRUD patterns. Operations: selectAny (flexible query with filters), selectOne (single record or null), select404 (single record or error), createAll (bulk insert array), updateAll (bulk update array), deleteAll (bulk soft-delete array), count (record count with filters), aggregate (analytics with GROUP BY). Requires authentication. All operations return data in format set during auth (default: TOON).

operation.description: Database operation matching src/lib/database.ts method names

params.description: Operation-specific parameters. For select*: {where, order, limit, offset, select}. For createAll/updateAll/deleteAll: array of records. For aggregate: {where, aggregate, groupBy}.
